contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Yasawa | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Island | pushpin_map = Fiji | pushpin_label_position = top | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Fiji | latd = 16 |latm = 46 |lats = 33 |latNS = S | longd = 177 |longm = 30 |longs = 50 |longEW = E | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_type = region:FJ_type:isle | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Fiji]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Divisions of Fiji|Division]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Western Division, Fiji|Western Division]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Provinces of Fiji|Province]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Ba Province]] | subdivision_type3 = Island group | subdivision_name3 = [[Yasawa Group]] | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = | seat = | unit_pref = Metric<!-- or US or UK --> | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 32 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 244 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1120 | population_as_of = 1983 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Yasawa''', also called '''Assawa''' and '''Ysava''', is the main island of the [[Yasawa Islands|Yasawa Group]], an [[archipelago]] in [[Fiji]]'s [[Western Division, Fiji|Western Division]]. Located at [[17th parallel south|17.00° South]] and 177.23° East, it covers an area of 32 square kilometers. It has a maximum altitude of 244 meters. The population was 1,120 in 1983. The islands are served by the [[Yasawa Island Airport]] {{airport codes|YAS|NFSW}}. == References == <references /> {{Unreferenced|date=July 2007}} <!--Navigation boxes--><br /> {{Yasawa}} {{Islands of Fiji}} [[Category:Ba Province]] [[Category:Islands of Fiji]] [[Category:Yasawa Islands]] {{Fiji-geo-stub}}
